sentences.en: " Even if they keep on eating badly , they won't gain weight,'says CEO Andre G . Pemet.
sentences.cn: 基塞首席执行官安德-C- 波奈说, “ 病人即使继续胡吃, 也不会再发胖. ”

sentences.en: By the second one, I realized this was going to transform communications— not just for the CEO, but also it would change how we do business.
sentences.cn: 但是我意识到，第二种方式能够改变人们交流的方式，不仅仅是首席执行官，它也会改变我们做生意的方式。

sentences.en: CEO made the whole decision - making, implementation will devolve power.
sentences.cn: CEO作出总体决策后, 具体执行权力就会下放.

sentences.en: Directors and CEO's can now set their corp standing towards themselves.
sentences.cn: 主管和CEO现在可以设置军团对他们自己的声望.

sentences.en: He was soon advanced to the position of CEO.
sentences.cn: 不久他被提升为总裁.

sentences.en: Henry Ford family CEO is the soul of Ford automobile corporation.
sentences.cn: 福特家族CEO是福特汽车公司的灵魂.

sentences.en: I’m the CEO of the company.
sentences.cn: 我是这家公司的首席执行官。

sentences.en: Jack . Welch Autobiography & gt ; praised as " the Holy Bible of CEO "
sentences.cn: 《 杰克·韦尔奇 自传》被誉为 “ CEO的圣经 ”

sentences.en: Many of these CEO's have significantly increased their international marketplace value.
sentences.cn: 很多这么做的CEO们显著提高了他们自己在国际商务市场上的价值.

sentences.en: Only then - CEO Alex Trotman collected a bigger bonus from Ford that year.
sentences.cn: 但是当时前任CEO阿历克斯.卓特曼从福特公司获得了数目更多的分红.

sentences.en: Plenty of professionals want to meet the CEO, CIO, or C - whoever - can - help.
sentences.cn: 不少职场人士想认识CEO 、 CIO等,以及任何只要能帮得上忙的管理层.

sentences.en: Really, sina CEO Cao Guowei discovered this the main chance.
sentences.cn: 的确, 新浪CEO曹国伟发现了这个“好机会”.

sentences.en: That is about me this time. I am the CEO.
sentences.cn: 这次才是我的时代，我是首席执行官。

sentences.en: The book will show you what the best CEO should know.
sentences.cn: 这本书会告诉你最好的执行总裁该了解什么。

sentences.en: The CEO answers questions and asks his or her own questions.
sentences.cn: CEO回答这些问题,并向他询问一些其他问题.

sentences.en: The CEO functions as the leader of the company.
sentences.cn: 首席执行官(CEO)起着领导公司的作用.

sentences.en: The employee gets to ask the CEO about anything work related.
sentences.cn: 该名职员可以向CEO询问任何与工作相关的事情.

sentences.en: Then he went to work for a battery research company and waited years before the founder promoted him to CEO.
sentences.cn: 随后他去了一家电池研究公司工作，历经数年，直到创始人将他提拔为首席执行官。

sentences.en: Wang Jingying of royal and online CEO says not without agitato.
sentences.cn: 盛大在线CEO王静颖不无兴奋地说.

sentences.en: You cannot be accepted because you are a CEO.
sentences.cn: 你不会因为是CEO而得到认可.

sentences.en: You'd think it might be our CEO or the workers, but in fact, the stockholders control the money so they have the most power.
sentences.cn: 你会认为有决定权的可能是我们的执行总裁或工人，可事实是股东控制着钱，所以他们的权利最大。

trans.tran_en: the person with the most authority in a large company
